channel.title: How to make multi zone for npc* so we can multi combat a boss with other players
channel.description:
please help me.. i heard that i had to sheash for isInMulti in npchandler.java.. i looked for it.. but i didnot find any isInMulti:
im usin a PI server please help me..
i really need to know.. where i have to put the cords for the multi zone.. please
